h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: In some ways, the Shigandang will have some familiar moves to the Stone Vanguard, most notably the ability for certain stone attacks to glow before exploding and damaging anything nearby, so whenever you see a stone pillar shoot up and glow, that’s your cue to get away.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
In some ways, the Shigandang will have some familiar moves to the Stone Vanguard, most notably the ability for certain stone attacks to glow before exploding and damaging anything nearby, so whenever you see a stone pillar shoot up and glow, that’s your cue to get away.
